name: Aspirations
description:
Introducing

A story about heroes, demons and other things.

A submission for the I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story game jam.

Featuring

Fun and quirky characters on an adventure

A narrative experience of dialogue and cutscenes

Battles in the form of rhythm game

Trailer
